messages.subject: Subject: Re: midwest conference?
messages.msgSnippet: Um, Michigan here.  Willing to help, but don t count on me for much of anything for next months (my chemo, dh s surgery). Ann Midwest! That would be great. I m
messages.messageBody:
Um, Michigan here. Willing to help, but don't count on me for much of
anything for next months (my chemo, dh's surgery).

Ann


Midwest! That would be great. I'm in Illinois. Know absolutely nothing
about planning/running a conference, but I'm willing to do grunt work
:-)

Kay


Amy wrote: Yes, yes, yes!! I'm in the NW corner of the state but
Columbus (middle) has a
large homeschool community...some of which are bound to be unschoolers.
Uh...I wasn't really volunteering to organize one but would love to
attend.
